soen6441.team01.warzone.view

Class ViewFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.view.ViewFactory

  • public class ViewFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Software Factory design pattern to manage the set of objects that define the respective classes for the different Warzone views.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewFactory(ModelFactory p_models)
      Constructor with views defined.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ViewFactory CreateWarzoneBasicConsoleGameViews(ModelFactory p_model)
      Helper function that creates a software factory that holds the Warzone view objects for the console version of the game.
      IGamePlayView getGamePlayConsoleView(IGamePlayController p_controller)
      Creates a GamePlay console view
      IGameStartupView getGameStartupConsoleView(IGameStartupController p_controller)
      Creates a GameStartup console view
      IMapEditorView getMapEditorConsoleView(IMapEditorController p_controller)
      Creates a Map Editor console view

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewFactory

        public ViewFactory(ModelFactory p_models)
        Constructor with views defined. Views passed as null will result in the default view being passed back.
        Parameters:
        p_models - the software factory for all the game models

    • Method Detail

      • CreateWarzoneBasicConsoleGameViews

        public static ViewFactory CreateWarzoneBasicConsoleGameViews(ModelFactory p_model)
        Helper function that creates a software factory that holds the Warzone view objects for the console version of the game.
        Parameters:
        p_model - the model software foctory to use
        Returns:
        newly create Warzone view software factory
